A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Most disappointed with Luke's portrayal. 40 years since Luke's return to the big screen and it's unfortunate how dismal and crotchety the character has been turned into in The Last Jedi... The new series lacks continuity with the previous Star Wars movies. If you're hoping for a Star Wars that builds upon what was already previously built\, \"this isn't the [movie] you're looking for.\"
